title: Harvard and The Chef: How Joanne Chang used Applied Mathematics to Build a Baking Empire
itunes:title: Harvard and The Chef: How Joanne Chang used Applied Mathematics to Build a Baking Empire
itunes:subtitle: We interview Brad Leone, star of Bon Appetit's "Its Alive with Brad”; introduce our recipe for Salmon Chraimeh; learn to toast grains; and Dan Pashman of the Sporkful on the geometry of a pizza slice.
description:
We interview Brad Leone, star of Bon Appetit’s “Its Alive with Brad”; introduce our recipe for Salmon Chraimeh; learn to toast grains; and Dan Pashman of the Sporkful on the geometry of a pizza slice.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
